(Whoa, sorry there JP, hotmail was sending me old mail. I musta got 'em 
mixed up.)

Quickstrike:






Quickstrike entered the threshold of the base. He turned his long body 
around, hearing the auto-gun fire. He saw the unconscious body of Shredder. 
He said coldly, "Shoulda told him not t' move." He chuckled whickedly after.

Soon after, he heard Silverstyke's voice over his comm-link. His crimson 
eyes blinked and looked into the hallway. He said into his comm-link to 
Silverstke, "Hey Silverstyke, ah'm sendin' someone fer ya!" He shouted into 
the hallway, for Sinesis. "Hey Sinesis, get yer kiester over here! Ah need 
ya t' get Silverstryke! Ya know that bot?"

He then sensed a bot near him. He slowly turned his body and saw a heavily 
armored turtle-bot. "What? Who in tarnation are you?"
